Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Vibrant \Vi"brant\, a. [L. vibrans, p. pr.: cf. F. vibrant. See {Vibrate}.] Vibrating; tremulous; resonant; as, vibrant drums. --Longfellow. [1913 Webster]
vibrant adj : vigorous and active; "a vibrant group that challenged the system"; "a charming and vivacious hostess"; "a vivacious folk dance" [syn: {vivacious}]
